content: 1/4 square watermelon amigurumi this is an icrochetthings original pattern © 2024 for personal use only do not copy sell alter or distribute this pattern or parts of it you may sell a limited number of your handmade finished items provided you credit icrochetthings as the designer copyright © 2024 icrochetthings 2/4 materials key dk weight yarn in light green chain = chain medium green dark green single_crochet = single_crochet 3 mm crochet hook increase = increase stuffing decrease = decrease scissors skip = skip yarn needle f/o = finish off x = repeat x = total number of stitches underlined = work in the same stitch information contact size tall ravelry icrochetthings 3 etsy icrochetthings tumblr i-crochet-things copyright © 2024 icrochetthings 3/4 watermelon - begin with light green - stuff as you go - increase = work 3 single_crochet in the same stitch - decrease = decrease over the next 3 stitches - at the end of each round slip_stitch into the first stitch of the round then chain 1 do not crochet in these stitches and they are not included in the final count 1 work 4 single_crochet in a magic_ring 4 2 increase around 12 3 single_crochet increase single_crochet around 20 - attach medium green - all stitches marked in green should be done in medium green yarn and all unmarked stitches should be done in light green yarn - remember stitches underlined together should be worked in the same stitch 4 2 single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet 4 single_crochet three times single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet 2 single_crochet 28 5
